eu.lestard.assertj.javafx.api

Class BindingAssert<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<BindingAssert<T>,Binding<T>>
      • eu.lestard.assertj.javafx.api.BindingAssert<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.assertj.core.api.Assert<BindingAssert<T>,Binding<T>>, org.assertj.core.api.Descriptable<BindingAssert<T>>, org.assertj.core.api.ExtensionPoints<BindingAssert<T>,Binding<T>>

    public class BindingAssert<T>
extends org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<BindingAssert<T>,Binding<T>>
    Assertion methods for Bindings.

    To create an instance of this class, invoke Assertions.assertThat(Binding).

        public BindingAssert<T> dependsOn(Observable observable)
        Verifies that the actual Binding is bound and depends on the given Observable value.
